web.label: Full-Stack Web & Product Engineering
web.general:
Hi, I'm a senior full-stack engineer and product-minded architect.

I design and build web applications end-to-end: from requirements and UX to backend architecture, DevOps, and production monitoring. I enjoy turning ambiguous business ideas into stable, maintainable software products.
web.section:
Full-Stack Excellence: Building robust web applications from concept to deployment.
Technical Stack: Python (FastAPI/Flask), Node.js, React, Next.js, TypeScript.
Database Expertise: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL with optimized query design.
API Development: RESTful APIs, background workers, integrations with third-party APIs.
Cloud & DevOps: Docker, CI/CD pipelines, basic monitoring and logging.

mobile.label: Mobile Apps & Cross-Platform
mobile.general:
Hi, I'm a full-stack and mobile engineer focused on shipping reliable apps.

I build cross-platform and native mobile applications, connect them to secure backends, and care about performance, UX, and maintainability.
mobile.section:
Mobile Development: Native iOS/Android and cross-platform apps with Flutter/React Native.
Mobile-First Design: Responsive, intuitive UI/UX following platform guidelines.
App Store: Deployment support and basic ASO strategy.
Offline & Sync: Robust offline functionality with seamless data sync.

coding.label: Innovation, Automation & Prototyping
coding.general:
Hi, I'm an engineer who enjoys exploring new ideas, automating workflows, and building proof-of-concept products.

I work across the stack, from backend services and data pipelines to quick interfaces that help validate concepts with real users.
coding.section:
Innovation Prototyping: Rapid MVPs and proof-of-concept projects.
Emerging Tech: AI/ML integration, automation, experimental features.
Performance: Load testing, security reviews, and optimization.
R&D: Exploring new frameworks, APIs, and architectural patterns.

hybrid.label: Hybrid IT & Business Consulting
hybrid.general:
Hi, I'm a technology consultant and solutions architect with experience bridging business strategy and engineering teams.

I specialize in translating business goals into clear technical roadmaps, coordinating stakeholders, and making sure that IT projects deliver measurable outcomes instead of just features.
hybrid.section:
Hybrid IT & business roles: technology consulting, technical project management, IT strategy and digital transformation.
Focus: stakeholder alignment, requirements clarification, roadmapping, and managing trade-offs between scope, budget, and timelines.
Typical roles: Technology Consultant, Technical Project Manager, IT Strategy Advisor for multilingual or globally distributed teams.
